title: Buy These Winter Ski Passes Now Before Prices Go Up
description:
Being a free spirit who “goes with the flow” and doesn’t plan for trips or activities is often seen as a valid (and fun) way of living. But many of us simply can’t live that way; we know there are benefits to thinking ahead. For one, if you can allow yourself to dream of snowy slopes while it’s still sweaty outside,…

Read more...

title: The Best Ways to Reuse Wine Corks Instead of Throwing Them Away
description:
When we think of cork, the cylindrical stoppers in wine bottles probably come to mind first. But the sustainable material can also be used in other ways throughout a home, including as flooring, wall paneling, and in light fixtures—not to mention for a range of home repairs. With this is mind, why throw away your…

Read more...

title: Get Rid of These Dealbreakers Before Trying to Sell Your House
description:
Contrary to what we see on most home transformation TV shows, everyone’s not on the same page when it comes to home design. One person could walk into a postwar bungalow and fall in love with the original bathroom with pastel pink fixtures and tiles, while the next person who views the home sees it as a dealbreaker.

Read more...

title: Avoid These Multipurpose Room Mistakes
description:
Being confined to our homes in the early days of the pandemic made many people rethink how they utilize their space. Desks, tables, counters, and other flat surfaces became makeshift home offices and classrooms, and guest rooms were used to isolate sick members of a household.

Read more...
